wikipedia_page.main: Glyn Davidge (31 December 1933 – 18 March 2006) was a Welsh international flanker who played club rugby for Tredegar and Newport. He was awarded nine caps for Wales and toured with Arthur Smith's 1962 British Lions squad.

response: *18 March - Glyn Davidge, Wales international and British Lion rugby player, 72
